title: tripura sundarI namOstutE
sahitya:
tripura sundarI namOstutE dIna janAbhISTa dAyini shrI


anupallavi

 traipada parabrahma rUpiNI tatpada lakSyArttha svarUpiNI


caraNam   vEda shAstrAdi vinuta sphUrttE vidhi guruguhAdi pUjita mUrttE 
kAmita phalaprada nipuNa kIrttE kamanIya kAmakalA pradarshitE 
mAdhava sOdarI mahiSAsurAdi marddanI mahAdEva manOhari 
mahA kailAsa vAsa priyakarI mahA kAmEshvarI sampatkarI
